sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHL01
UPPER(EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #eaiBizCode# , '%') )
UPPER(UBMUGIGN) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #searchUbmugign# , '%') )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO , EAIBZWKDSTCD , TRANCODE , STARTBIT , SYSMODE , SYSTYPE , SYSSEND , SYSRECV , UBMUGIGN , UBMUSEQ FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHL01 , (SELECT @NO := 0) R
UPPER(EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #eaiBizCode# , '%') )
UPPER(UBMUGIGN) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #searchUbmugign# , '%') )
ORDER BY EAIBZWKDSTCD ) T WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
